com.ostrichemulators.semtool.rdf.engine.api

Interface IEngine

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractEngine, AbstractSesameEngine, BigDataEngine, ClusterEngine, InMemorySesameEngine, JenaEngine, SesameEngine

    public interface IEngine
    This interface standardizes the functionality of the engines to be used. All current engines must implement this interface so that they can be used without first recognizing what specific engine class it is. A lot of different classes call on IEngine to refer to a specific engine, including, most notably, ProcessQueryListener.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $
    Author:
    karverma

    • Method Detail

      • openDB

        void openDB(Properties props)
     throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException
        Opens a database as defined by these properties. What is included in the properties is dependent on the type of engine that is being initiated. This is the function that first initializes an engine. One property in particular should ALWAYS be included in the Properties argument: Constants.SMSS_LOCATION.
        Parameters:
        props - contains all information regarding the data store and how the engine should be instantiated. Dependent on what type of engine is being instantiated.
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException - if something goes wrong

      • closeDB

        void closeDB()
        Closes the data base associated with the engine. This will prevent further changes from being made in the data store and safely ends the active transactions and closes the engine.

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        Returns whether or not an engine is currently connected to the data store. The connection becomes true when openDB(java.util.Properties) is called and the connection becomes false when closeDB() is called.
        Returns:
        true if the engine is connected to its data store and false if it is not

      • calculateInferences

        void calculateInferences()
                  throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException
        Makes the engine calculate inferences, if the engine supports such calculations. This function also commits the current transaction
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException - if anything goes wrong

      • setEngineName

        void setEngineName(String engineName)
        Sets the name of the engine. This may be a lot of times the same as the Repository Name
        Parameters:
        engineName - - Name of the engine that this is being set to

      • getEngineName

        String getEngineName()
        Gets the engine name for this engine
        Returns:
        Name of the engine it is being set to

      • commit

        void commit()
        Commit the database. Commits the active transaction. This operation ends the active transaction.

      • getNamespaces

        Map<String,String> getNamespaces()
        Gets a prefix-to-namespace mapping
        Returns:

      • setSchemaBuilder

        void setSchemaBuilder(UriBuilder bldr)
        Sets the start of the URI to be used for separating OWL statements from data statements (e.g., http://os-em.com/ontologies/semtool/)
        Parameters:
        bldr - the start of the URI. If it doesn't end in a trailing slash, one will be added

      • setDataBuilder

        void setDataBuilder(UriBuilder bldr)
        Sets the start of the URI to be used for separating data statements from OWL statements. Defaults to using the namespace of getBaseUri()
        Parameters:
        bldr -

      • getSchemaBuilder

        UriBuilder getSchemaBuilder()
        Gets a URI builder for constructing OWL metamodel URIs
        Returns:
        the default uri for OWL statements for this engine, or null, if one has not been set

      • getDataBuilder

        UriBuilder getDataBuilder()
        Gets the data URI builder for this engine.
        Returns:
        the default uri for instances for this engine, or null, if one has not been set

      • getProperty

        String getProperty(String key)
        Gets a single property from getProperties()
        Parameters:
        key -
        Returns:

      • getProperties

        Properties getProperties()
        Returns a copy of this engine's properties
        Returns:

      • setProperty

        void setProperty(String key,
                 String val)
        Sets/clears a property
        Parameters:
        key - the key to set/clear
        val - the value. If null or empty, the property key is removed from the properties. Else, the property is set to this value

      • query

        <T> T query(QueryExecutor<T> exe)
     throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException,
            org.openrdf.query.MalformedQueryException,
            org.openrdf.query.QueryEvaluationException
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException
        org.openrdf.query.MalformedQueryException
        org.openrdf.query.QueryEvaluationException

      • queryNoEx

        <T> T queryNoEx(QueryExecutor<T> exe)
        Runs a query but does not throw exceptions. If anything exceptional happens, this function return null
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of result
        Parameters:
        exe - the query executor to run
        Returns:
        the results, or null if something bad happened

      • update

        void update(UpdateExecutor ue)
     throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException,
            org.openrdf.query.MalformedQueryException,
            org.openrdf.query.UpdateExecutionException
        Runs an update on the engine.
        Parameters:
        ue -
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException
        org.openrdf.query.MalformedQueryException
        org.openrdf.query.UpdateExecutionException
        SecurityException - if the user does not have enough permissions to run the update

      • execute

        void execute(ModificationExecutor exe)
      throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException
        Executes the given modification on the repository connection. The block will be executed within a transaction.
        Parameters:
        exe - the logic to execute
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException

      • getBaseUri

        org.openrdf.model.URI getBaseUri()
        Gets the base URI for this engine. Usually, this will be set in the properties file.
        Returns:
        the base uri for this engine, or null, if one has not been set
